wiki_section_title: Teams -- Stadia and locations

wiki_section_text: ChumphonHat YaiKrabiNakhon Si ThammaratPattaniPhang NgaPhattalungF.C . PhuketRanongSatunSurat ThaniTrangYala Locations of the Regional League South Teams

intro: 2010 Regional League Division 2 Southern Region is the 2nd season of the League competition since its establishment in 2009. It is in the third tier of the Thai football league system. The league has been expanded from 8 clubs in 2009 to 14 clubs this season. The league winners and runners up will qualify for the 2010 Regional League Division 2 championship stage.

qa.question: Which 2010 Regional League Division 2 Southern Region team plays at the stadium with the largest capacity ?
